entry.title: Town Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Red_127

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,138Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 248

Summary: After Stiles's mother dies, his father remarries Melissa McCall and Stiles suddenly finds himself on the outskirts of his own family. In his last year of high school and while taking night classes as a local community college, Stiles meets Derek Hale and the two make an instant connection. Derek pulls Stiles into his own family and shows him what it's like to truly be loved by people who would do anything for you. Even when that means causing abnormal amounts of chaos, tricking the entire town, and generally ruining the Sheriff's Day.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,549Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 50

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,564Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 18

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,642Chapters: 28/35Kudos: 111

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.
